title: 250: The Roots of Tantra with Chandresh Bhardwaj
itunes:title: 250: The Roots of Tantra with Chandresh Bhardwaj
description:
As interest in Tantra increases, it’s important we know the roots of this ancient science and there is no better person to learn from than 7th generation Tantra guru Chandresh Bhardwaj. In this in-depth episode, we go into the history of Tantra, Tantric meditation, why you should not meditate to the mantra “om” or “shring”, the Goddess Kali and more. If you’re interested in the Vedas, yoga and spirituality, you’re going to LOVE this episode!
